extraContent.title: Specter Form
extraContent.content:
Ark has two forms, Lef Form and Specter Form which he can freely transform between. However, in 1st Job, you will have no control over when you transform. As you progress the story and reach 2nd Job, you unlock the skill Master Corruption that allows you to switch between forms

Specter Form is only a temporary boost and the time is limited. Ark has a special gauge that indicates how long you can stay in Specter Form. This gauge slowly regenerates while in Lef Form. While in Specter Form, certain skills are swapped. These skills will share Skill Points (SP) and the same Key Slot. Below is a list of all Lef and Specter skill counterparts:

  • / Mystic Leap & Instinctual Leap (1st Job)
  • / Scarlet Charge Drive & Grievous Wound (2nd Job)
  • Unstoppable Impulse & Tenacious Instinct (2nd Job)
  • / Gust Charge Drive & Insatiable Hunger (3rd Job)
  • / Abyssal Charge Drive & Unbridled Chaos (4th Job)

Linking Skills:

Ark can link any attack to Basic Charge Drive or Endless Dream, in their respective forms. Linking attacks will remove any end animation delays and prevent the linked attack used from displacing you. In 4th Job, you unlock a skill called Battle Frenzy that makes linking skills easier with each successful linked attack

meta: Ark is a STR pirate class part of the Flora class group. He uses his Specter arm combined with Lef martial arts to defeat enemies. Ark can transform into a Specter at will for a short period to dish out high damage with high mobility. He has REALLY strong mobbing potential. His bossing capabilities are just as good but require a bit of mechanics
